title: Welcome to the Dynamic JSON API Server!
content: This server is built with Go and demonstrates a clean, hexagonal architecture. It supports hot-reloading and transactional file persistence.

title: Understanding RESTful APIs
content: REST provides a set of architectural principles for designing networked applications. This API follows those principles for collections and keyed-objects.

title: A Guide to Go's Concurrency
content: Go's goroutines and channels make concurrent programming straightforward and efficient. This server uses mutexes for safe concurrent access.
